AUTHOR: Injabie3#1660
INSTALL_MSG: The roleAssigner module was installed.  Please run [p]ra for details.
NAME: RoleAssigner
SHORT: Role assigner: assign one role from a list of roles to all users.
DESCRIPTION: Role assigner: assign one role from a list of roles to all users.  Useful if you have seasonal roles in which you want to assign different colours to different users.
